page.title: 13FESTIVALS-ST.MERRYN CARNIVAL
page.content:
The big{annual festival}in St Merryn is the{carnival}. The carnival is planned by{a committee of eleven people which includes the chairman, treasurer and secretary.It takes six months to organise the carnival and it takes twenty people to run it.The committee doesn't change every year. The carnival is in July each year but on a different day. There are{15 classes}this year and it is getting bigger each year. This year there are going to be inflatable amusements and refreshments as extras. {The prizes}are 8 cups ,20 shields, 15 medals .The Fairy Queens and Carnival Queens present the cups,shields,and medals to the winners in each class.
.
